resources.string:
This app was developed by: 
 David Fulton

 in colloboration with :
 
James Japp, Neuropsychologist UK, a brain injury employment service set-up in 2002.

 For more information on Neuropsychologist UK

 please visit:
 www.neuropsychologistsuk.co.uk
Find out which type of job and work environments may suit you best
Visualisation of your top work environments
Simply select which option suits you best and let What\'s your Job do the rest!

Please read and answer questions carefully based on your interest in the activity.
\ 
 Do not worry about qualifications or experience. 
\ 
 There are 35 questions, each with 4 options. 
\ 
 Please make sure to read questions carefully before answering.

This is an occupational profile aimed at those aged 16 to 25 who do not intend to go onto university. \n\n The jobs listed do not require a university level qualification though some may require additional training.
